definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: E. If the enclosing sides adjoin each other, the area should be properly vented.
sentences.chinese: 如果封闭的侧面彼此邻接，该区域要有适当的通风。

sentences.english: In another word, the range of relating right shall not be unreasonably extended.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，邻接权的范围不得被不合理的扩大。

sentences.english: The garden abutted on to an orchard.
sentences.chinese: 这个花园与一个果园邻接。

sentences.english: Molecular phylogenetic trees were constructed with Neighbor-Joining method.
sentences.chinese: 用邻接法进行分子系统发育分析。

sentences.english: First, the algorithm mines the data for frequent sequences and computes an adjacency lattice.
sentences.chinese: 首先，该算法挖掘频繁序列的数据并计算一个邻接格。
我们在邻接的房间工作。

sentences.english: Contiguity eliminates residual spaces between buildings.
sentences.chinese: 邻接处消除了建筑物之间的残余空间。

sentences.english: Flower petals are joined near the base and stamens alternate with the corolla lobes.
sentences.chinese: 花翼瓣在底部邻接，雄蕊与冠片交错。

sentences.english: However, from the angle of psychology, transferred epithet belongs to "Figures Based on Contiguity".
sentences.chinese: 但是，从移就的心理基础看，它又属于“邻接联想”。

sentences.english: The two houses join at this point.
Erlangmiao fracture belt is the only fracture structure to connect Houba oil sands.
sentences.chinese: 二郎庙断裂带是邻接厚坝油砂岩的唯一断裂构造。

sentences.english: The contiguous bodies of the system perform controlled relative motion.
sentences.chinese: 系统中各邻接刚体之间作受控的相对运动。

sentences.english: Based on the adjacency matrix of the network graph, the theoretical proof of the topological arithmetic is given.
sentences.chinese: 以图论中邻接矩阵为基础，给出了该算法的理论证明。

sentences.english: an apartment complex in the convent and the adjoining buildings.
sentences.chinese: 在修道院和邻接的建筑里设置一间复合套房。

sentences.english: A country of southwest Africa bordering on the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 非洲西南部一国家，邻接大西洋。
